venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Continuing the Funded Founders Breakfast series:

For our December event, we have Funded Founders from Ubersense and BISON Alternatives, with Paulina Hill from Polaris Ventures filling the "funder" seat.  Earlier this fall, Ubersense received $1.1 million in seed funding.  BISON received $1.33 million in seed over the summer.

RSVP NOW:

When: Tuesday, December 18, 2012 8-10 am - light breakfast
Where: Microsoft NERD, One Memorial Drive, Cambridge, MA
Who: Funded Founders AND a funder!
What: A panel of Funded founders and a funder discuss how to fund your startup.

-- How to connect with potential funders
-- How to structure a funding
-- How the company story evolves over time
-- How long it takes to nail down funding
-- What they would do differently if they had to do it again
-- What recommendations do they have for others
-- What do you want to know? Bring your questions!

We'll open the doors at 8:00 am for networking and breakfast, and kick off the panel promptly at 9:00 am. We're providing coffee and a light breakfast to get your day started right!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Horace Mann room at the NERD Center. Check in with building security for directions.
item.name: Funded Founders Panel and networking
